kannada_original: ನಾಳೆ ಎಂಬುದು ಕನಸು, ಇಂದು ಜೀವನ ಸೊಗಸು;
english_transliteration: Nāḷe embudu kanasu, indu jīvana sogasu;
english_translation: Tomorrow is a dream, today is the charm of life;
The past is a garland of flower-memories and thorns.
Did the account of the last minute come written down?

kannada_original: ನಗು, ನಗಿಸು ನೀ ಇಂದು – ಮುದ್ದು ರಾಮ.
english_transliteration: nagu, nagisu nī indu – Muddu Rāma.
english_translation: Laugh, and make others laugh today – Muddu Rāma.
